players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."

You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. 
We need to stay united, Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. Stay vigilant, everyone."
You: "I am the mafioso and I will continue to protect our group. Let's work together to eliminate any threats."
Bob: "I am not the mafioso. I was unaware of any plans to harm Diana last night, and I have no reason to suspect anyone other than Alice based on Charlie's statement."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
